attributes.agent_name: CMH Jeep Alfa Romeo Fiat Umhlanga
attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877277292. With the Jeep® Wrangler Sport nothing stands in the way of adventure. 
Staying true to its heritage with iconic round headlamps and seven slot grille, 
the Wrangler Sport is completely authentic and the ideal model for the entry 
into the fascinating world of the Jeep® Wrangler.

Coming highly spec’d with the below as standard:

•	Uconnect 7” Touchscreen 
•	3.5 TFT Display 
•	Apple Carplay & Android Auto 
•	LED Lighting Group (Headlights, Taillights, DRLs, Fog Lamps) 
•	Push-Button Start and Remote Proximity 
•	Keyless Entry 
•	Blind Spot Monitor and Rear Cross Path Detection 
•	Rearview Camera & Front/Rear Parking Sensors 
•	Deep Tint Sunscreen Windows 
•	Security Alarm 
•	Removable Hard Top 
•	17” Black Painted Aluminium Wheels

At CMH Jeep Umhlanga we have tastefully added:

•	80th Anniversary Decals
•	Moulded Side Steps

Come into CMH Jeep and start your next adventure now!
